title: Tamil Politicians – Priests – Public Officials and Academics killed by the LTTE
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – However much the TNA or the new Northern Province Chief Minister C V Wigneswaran attempts to turn a megalomaniac terrorist banned by 32 foreign nations as a Terrorist Organization, into a ‘HERO’ there are some hard facts that Tamils should not forget. First reminder is – LTTE’s first killing…
